languages.text: Несколько кораблей направляются прямиком к вам. Команда авгуров сообщает, что сигнатуры их двигателей схожи с теми, что были у "Оседлавшего тьму". Пираты решили отомстить за своего подельника, Пустотелого Виктора, и не расположены к переговорам.

traits.locale_text: Несколько кораблей направляются прямиком к вам. Команда авгуров сообщает, что сигнатуры их двигателей схожи с теми, что были у "Оседлавшего тьму". Пираты решили отомстить за своего подельника, Пустотелого Виктора, и не расположены к переговорам.

languages.text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.
languages.original_text: Несколько кораблей направляются прямиком к вам. Команда авгуров сообщает, что сигнатуры их двигателей схожи с теми, что были у "Оседлавшего тьму". Пираты решили отомстить за своего подельника, Пустотелого Виктора, и не расположены к переговорам.

traits.locale_text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates seek revenge for one of theirs, Hollow-Body Victor, and aren't in a negotiating mood.

Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates seek revenge for one of theirs, Hollow-Body Victor, and aren't in a negotiating mood.

Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates seek revenge for one of theirs, Hollow-Body Victor, and aren't in a negotiating mood.

Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

languages.text: 几艘船直奔你而来。俄歇矩阵扫描结果显示，这些舰船的引擎特征与黑暗之鞍号非常相似。这群海盗打算为他们的同伴“空心”维克多复仇，而且他们没兴趣进行谈判。
languages.original_text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

traits.locale_text: 几艘船直奔你而来。俄歇矩阵扫描结果显示，这些舰船的引擎特征与黑暗之鞍号非常相似。这群海盗打算为他们的同伴“空心”维克多复仇，而且他们没兴趣进行谈判。

languages.text: Varias naves se dirigen directamente hacia ti. El equipo de augures informa de que las señales de sus motores son similares a las del Jinete de la Oscuridad. Los piratas buscan vengar a uno de los suyos, Víctor Corazón Hueco, y no tienen ganas de negociar.
languages.original_text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

traits.locale_text: Varias naves se dirigen directamente hacia ti. El equipo de augures informa de que las señales de sus motores son similares a las del Jinete de la Oscuridad. Los piratas buscan vengar a uno de los suyos, Víctor Corazón Hueco, y no tienen ganas de negociar.

languages.text: 数隻の船がまっすぐこちらに迫ってくる。スキャナー隊の報告によると、信号は暗黒のサドラー号のものと似ているという。海賊らは仲間のビクター・ザ・ホロウ・ハートの敵討ちを目論んでおり、交渉する気はまったくないようだ。
languages.original_text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

traits.locale_text: 数隻の船がまっすぐこちらに迫ってくる。スキャナー隊の報告によると、信号は暗黒のサドラー号のものと似ているという。海賊らは仲間のビクター・ザ・ホロウ・ハートの敵討ちを目論んでおり、交渉する気はまったくないようだ。

languages.text: Mehrere Schiffe fahren geradewegs auf dich zu. Das Augurenteam berichtet, dass ihre Triebwerkssignatur denen der Saddler of Darkness ähnelt. Die Piraten streben nach Rache für einen der ihren, Victor Hohlherz, und sind nicht in Verhandlungslaune.
languages.original_text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

traits.locale_text: Mehrere Schiffe fahren geradewegs auf dich zu. Das Augurenteam berichtet, dass ihre Triebwerkssignatur denen der Saddler of Darkness ähnelt. Die Piraten streben nach Rache für einen der ihren, Victor Hohlherz, und sind nicht in Verhandlungslaune.

languages.text: Plusieurs vaisseaux avancent droit sur vous. L'équipe des augures signale que la signature de leurs moteurs est similaire à celle du Bourrelier des ténèbres. Les pirates sont bien décidés à venger l'un des leurs, Victor le Cœur-creux, et ils ne sont pas d'humeur à négocier.
languages.original_text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.

traits.locale_text: Plusieurs vaisseaux avancent droit sur vous. L'équipe des augures signale que la signature de leurs moteurs est similaire à celle du Bourrelier des ténèbres. Les pirates sont bien décidés à venger l'un des leurs, Victor le Cœur-creux, et ils ne sont pas d'humeur à négocier.

languages.text: Birkaç gemi, doğrudan gemine doğru ilerliyor. Alamet ekibi, sürüş imzalarının Karanlığın Saracı'nınkine benzediğini rapor ediyor. Korsanlar, kendilerinden olan Yüreksiz Victor'ın intikamını almak istiyor ve müzakere etmek niyetinde değiller.
languages.original_text: Several ships head straight for you. The augur team reports that their drive signatures are similar to those of the Saddler of Darkness. The pirates are seeking revenge for one of their own, Victor the Hollow Heart, and they are in no mood to negotiate.
